mapper.insert: INSERT ad_like ( mb_idx, str_idx, like_type, like_status) VALUES ( #{mb_idx}, #{str_idx}, 'S', #{like_status})
mapper.update: update ad_like set like_status = #{like_status} where str_idx = #{str_idx} and mb_idx = #{mb_idx}
update ad_store set str_like_cnt = str_like_cnt-1 where str_idx = #{str_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_search_history (keyword, reg_date, reg_time, search_lang) VALUES(#{keyword}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%h:%i:%s'), #{lang})

INSERT INTO ad_use_chart (str_idx, chrt_gender, chrt_age, chrt_age_group, chrt_date) SELECT #{str_idx} AS str_idx, mb_gender AS chrt_gender, CASE WHEN mb_birth IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE FLOOR(DATEDIFF(NOW(), mb_birth) / 365) END AS chrt_age, CASE WHEN mb_birth IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE FLOOR(DATEDIFF(NOW(), mb_birth) / 3650)*10 END AS chrt_age_group, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') AS chrt_date FROM ad_member WHERE mb_idx = #{mb_idx}
